SELECT b.content_id, b.journal, b.bibtexAbstract, b.title, b.booktitle, b.author, b.group, b.simhash1 AS interhash, b.simhash2 AS intrahash, b.date, b.user_name FROM bibtex b JOIN user u USING (user_name) WHERE b.group < 1 AND u.role != 3 AND user_name != #requestingUserName# AND u.spammer != 1 ORDER BY change_date DESC LIMIT #count#

SELECT b.book_url_hash, b.book_description, b.group, u.user_name FROM bookmark b JOIN user u USING (user_name) WHERE b.group < 1 AND u.role != 3 AND user_name != #requestingUserName# AND u.spammer != 1 ORDER BY change_date DESC LIMIT #count#
